TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityBindTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子，將 類別與其他各種表示相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert classes to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 這個轉換子只能將 物件與字串相互轉換。This converter can only convert an object to and from a string. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱 TypeConverter 基底類別和[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the TypeConverter base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 您絕對不要建立 的執行個體。You should never create an instance of . 請改為呼叫 類別的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別中的範例。For more information, see the examples in the class.

span.span: The that provides a format context.
A that represents the type to convert.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示這個轉換子是否可以使用指定的內容，將指定來源型別中的物件轉換成 。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object of the given source type to an using the specified context.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換子可以執行轉換，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 為字串，則 `true` 會傳回 `sourceType`。 returns `true` if `sourceType` is a string.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanConvertTo (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type destinationType);

Public Overrides Function CanConvertTo (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, destinationType As Type) As Boolean
public: override bool CanConvertTo(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, Type ^ destinationType);

span.span: The that provides a format context.
A that represents the type to convert the to.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示這個轉換子是否可以使用指定內容，將 轉換成目的型別。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether this converter can convert an to the destination type using the specified context.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換子可以執行轉換，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可以是 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)，所以一定要檢查。This can be a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), so always check. 此外，`context` 物件的屬性可能會傳回 null 參考 (`Nothing`)。Also, properties on the `context` object can return a null reference (`Nothing`). > [!NOTE] > 請覆寫這個方法以提供您自己的轉換需求。Override this method to provide your own conversion requirements.

span.span: Converts the specified object to an , using the specified context and culture information.
The that represents the converted value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個轉換子只能將 物件與字串相互轉換。This converter can only convert an object to and from a string. `context` 可以用來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。`context` can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可以是 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)，所以一定要檢查。This can be a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), so always check. 此外，`context` 物件的屬性可能會傳回 null 參考 (`Nothing`)。Also, properties on the `context` object can return a null reference (`Nothing`).

exception.span: 當將 轉換為 時，發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred while converting to an .

span.span: A with the properties that are exposed for this data type, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there are no properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter/StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValues (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection
public: override System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter::StandardValuesCollection ^ GetStandardValues(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context);

span.span: The that provides a format context.

summary.span: 使用指定內容傳回 資料型別的標準值集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of standard values for the data type using the specified context.

returns.span: 保留標準有效值集合，如果資料型別不支援標準值集合則為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: A that holds a standard set of valid values or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the data type does not support a standard set of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 可用來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。`context` can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked. `context` 任何透過它可使用的屬性可以是 null 參考 (`Nothing`)。`context` or any property available through it can be a null reference (`Nothing`).

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool GetStandardValuesExclusive (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesExclusive(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValuesExclusive (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As Boolean
public: override bool GetStandardValuesExclusive(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context);

span.span: The that provides a format context.

summary.span: 使用指定的內容，傳回從 所傳回的標準值集合是否為可能值的獨占清單。

span.span: Returns whether the collection of standard values returned from is an exclusive list of possible values, using the specified context.

returns.span: 如果從 傳回的 是可能值的獨占清單則為 ，如果其他的值為可能則為 。

span.span: if the returned from is an exhaustive list of possible values; if other values are possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是獨占清單 (例如在列舉資料型別中)，則沒有其他有效值。If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid. 如果不是獨占清單，則除了 方法提供的標準值清單之外，可能還有其他有效值。If the list is not exclusive, then other valid values might exist in addition to the list of standard values that the method provides. 如果是獨占值，則 傳回的清單應該不允許編輯這些值。If the values are exclusive, the list returned by should not allow these values to be edited.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool GetStandardValuesSupported (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesSupported(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValuesSupported (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As Boolean
public: override bool GetStandardValuesSupported(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context);

span.span: The that provides a format context.

summary.span: 會使用指定的內容傳回，這個物件是否支援可從清單中挑選的標準值集合。

span.span: Returns whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified context.

returns.span: 如果應該呼叫 以尋找物件支援的通用值集合，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if should be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 參數可以用於擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從該環境叫用的。Use the `context` parameter to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked. 這個參數可以是 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)，所以一定要檢查。This parameter can be a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), so always check it. 此外，內容物件的屬性可能會傳回 null 參考 (`Nothing`)。Also, properties on the context object can return a null reference (`Nothing`).
